summary: This is an email chain from June 12, 2020, discussing a Jane Doe civil complaint related to the Epstein case. Prosecutors are analyzing the complaint for inconsistencies and potential new factual allegations, such as frequent flights with Ghislaine Maxwell, to possibly add to a criminal indictment.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Mentioned in the context of the Jane Doe civil complaint, specifically regarding allegations of frequent flights on a jet with the victim.

events.title: Email Discussion on Jane Doe Complaint
events.description: Prosecutors exchange emails analyzing a Jane Doe civil complaint for inconsistencies and potential new factual allegations to strengthen a criminal indictment.

keyFacts: Prosecutors are actively reviewing a Jane Doe civil complaint related to the Epstein case as of June 2020.
The complaint contains alleged inconsistencies, including the victim's age when she met Epstein and descriptions of events.
A specific allegation of interest involves frequent flights taken by the victim and Ghislaine Maxwell on a private jet.
The prosecution is looking for additional factual allegations from the civil complaint to potentially add to a criminal indictment.
